headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. If upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE , use multipart/form-data . If upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE_ID , use application/json .

parameters.name: music_scene
parameters.description: The scenario where the piece of music is used. Enum values: CREATIVE_ASSET : Creative Tools. CAROUSEL_ADS : Non-Shopping Ads - Carousel format. CATALOG_CAROUSEL : Shopping Ads (VSA) - Carousel format. Default value: CREATIVE_ASSET .

parameters.name: upload_type Conditional
parameters.description: When music_scene is set to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL , you need to pass in either upload_type or material_action . When music_scene is set to CREATIVE_ASSET or not passed, this field is optional and defaults to UPLOAD_BY_FILE . The way you upload your music. Enum values: UPLOAD_BY_FILE : To upload a piece of music via file. UPLOAD_BY_FILE_ID : To upload a piece of music via file ID.

parameters.name: material_action Conditional
parameters.description: When music_scene is set to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL , you need to pass in either upload_type or material_action . Not supported when music_scene is set to CREATIVE_ASSET or not passed. The type of operation you want to perform on a piece of music. You need to pass in material_id as well. Enum values: ADD_TO_LIKED : To add a piece of music to the Liked list. ADD_TO_HISTORY : To add a piece of music to the History list. REMOVE_FROM_LIKED : To remove a piece of music from the Liked list. Note : The Liked list of an ad account can have up to 1,000 pieces of music. When the limit is reached, you cannot set this field to ADD_TO_LIKED to add more music to the Liked list.

parameters.name: music_file Conditional
parameters.description: Required when upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE or not specified. Music file. Note : When music_scene is set to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL , the customized music file that you specify through this field should meet the following specifications requirements: File Type: MP3. File Size: no greater than 10 MB.

parameters.name: music_signature Conditional
parameters.description: Required when upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE or not specified. Music MD5 (used for server verification).

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Valid only when upload_type is passed. Music name. Length limit: 1-100 characters. The default is the local file name.

parameters.name: file_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when upload_type is UPLOAD_BY_FILE_ID . The file_id of the file that you want to upload. This field is for files that are uploaded to the file repository. You can get file_id via the Upload Files endpoints. Note : When music_scene is set to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL , the ID that you specify through this field should correspond to a customized music file that meets the following specifications requirements: File Type: MP3. File Size: no greater than 10 MB.

parameters.name: material_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when music_scene is set to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL and material_action is passed. Not supported when music_scene is set to CREATIVE_ASSET or not passed. Material ID for the piece of music, which is used for adding music to the Liked list or History list, or for removing music from the Liked list. To obtain a valid material ID , you can: upload a piece of customized music for Carousel Ads through this endpoint, OR retrieve the material IDs of music for Carousel Ads under an ad account via material_id returned by /file/music/get/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: sources
fields.description: Music source. USER means the advertiser's uploaded music; SYSTEM means the system music.

fields.name: author
fields.description: Returned only for music that can be used in Carousel Ads. Author of the piece of music.

fields.name: liked
fields.description: Returned only for music that can be used in Carousel Ads. Whether the piece of music is added to the Liked list.

fields.name: cover_url
fields.description: Returned only for music that can be used in Carousel Ads. URL of the cover for the piece of music.

fields.name: duration Conditional
fields.description: Music duration (in seconds). Only returned for system music.

fields.name: style Conditional
fields.description: Music style. Only returned for system music.

fields.name: copyright
fields.description: Copyright information. Enum values: MUSIC_FORBID_VIDEO_ALLOW : Music is not allowed to download, but the generated video is allowed to download. MUSIC_FORBID_VIDEO_FORBID : Both music and the generated video are not allowed to download.

fields.name: create_time Conditional
fields.description: Creation time. Only returned for advertiser's music. UTC Time. Format: 2020-06-10 T07: 39: 14Z.

fields.name: modify_time Conditional
fields.description: Modified time. Only returned for advertiser's music. Custom Soundtracks return this field, system music does not return this field. UTC Time. Format: 2020-06-10 T07: 39: 14Z.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
